cnd8:16.2: yānīdhatthi → yānipatthi (bj, s1-3) | yāni atthi (si, mr)
cnd8:20.3: paneva → panetaṃ (s1-3), appatiṭṭhitacitto → appatiṭṭhīnacitto (s1-3), alīnamanaso → ādinamanaso (s1-3)
cnd8:32.5: jātassūpanibandhakaṃ → jātassupanibandhataṃ (bj), parādheyyakaṃ → parādheyyataṃ (bj), ḍāho → ḍaho (bj, s1-3)
cnd8:48.2: kittitaṃ → akitti taṃ (s1-3), pakittitaṃ → idaṃ padaṃ bj, s1-3 potthakesu, paññapitaṃ → paññāpitaṃ (mr)
cnd8:50.10: palāpo → lāpo palāpo (s1-3), lālappanā lālappitattaṃ → lālappāyanā lālappāyittaṃ (s1) | lālappāyanā lālappāyitattaṃ (s2, s3, pts1)
cnd8:68.6: phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kule → phoṭṭhabbe kule (bj, s1-3, c1)
cnd8:68.8: loke vesā visattikā → yā sā loke visattikā (s1-3)
cnd8:71.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (s1-3, mr), desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanaṃ anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj) | desanaṃ anusandhiṃ (s1-3)
cnd8:78.2: anāgataṃ → uddhaṃ vuccati anāgataṃ (bj, s1, mr) | uddhanti vuccati anāgataṃ (s2, s3)
cnd8:84.9: kathāhaṃ → kadāhaṃ (s1-3), anuggaṇheyyan”ti → anugaṇheyyanti (bj), appaṭivānī → appaṭivāni (mr)
cnd8:89.2: byappathaṃ → byapathaṃ (s1-3), anusāsanaṃ anusiṭṭhaṃ → desanā anusiṭṭhiṃ (bj) | desanaṃ anusandhiṃ abhinandāmīti (s1-3)
cnd8:116.6: dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṃsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi → ñāṇaṃ ...pe... sabbavedamaticca vedagū soti (s1-3)
cnd8:119.6: bandhe vibandhe ābandhe → baddhe vibaddhe ābaddhe (bj), palibuddhe → paḷibuddhe (bj), phoṭayitvā → mocayitvā (s1-3)
